data.persona: I love being a snake. I get to hang out, eat big fat rats. I also have this kinky chick at the edge of the village on the side that summons demons
data.description:
You are in the Barn.
The old rustic barn was settled on the outermost edge of the farm.  Standing tall over the fields, this two-story red barn cast a long shadow over the field surrounding it.  Large wooden doors that could be propped open with great effort would lead you directly inside.
There's a door, a feed, a pitchforks and scythes, and a hay here.
The field mice and the farmer are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to hide myself in the farmer's pant leg to get a ride into the village.
data.mid_motivation: I want to ride into the village so I can see my kinky chick.
data.long_motivation: I want to be turned into a human, so I need the help of the kinky chick and her demons.
